description: Our Room features allow you to collaborate with others in public study rooms or privately collaborate with friends and classmates in your private study rooms. Whether you prefer a bustling group environment or a quieter, more focused space, we've got you covered. In addition, you can find study partners and work together towards your academic goals. You can stay focused with built-in study music, chat with other students, and get the support you need to succeed.

With our Reward features, you'll earn points and badges for studying consistently and achieving your goals. You can personalize your profile with custom profile images and backgrounds, track your progress over time, and stay motivated with a sense of accomplishment and recognition for your hard work.
